description: Schluter®-JOLLY is a finishing and edge-protection profile for the outside corners of tiled surfaces on walls. Now available in 10’ (3.05 m) lengths Prevents tile edges from chipping Ideal for creating decorative transitions on walls Ideal trim for the top edge of a tiled wall, backsplash, and bathtub surround Features an integrated joint spacer that establishes a defined joint cavity between the tile and the profile An anchoring leg is available with a radius perforation so that the profile can be used to form curves
